currency.name: Currency
currency.description: Assets whose main use is as a medium of exchange or store of value.

layer_1.name: Layer 1
layer_1.description: The base layer of a blockchain network.

layer_2.name: Layer 2
layer_2.description: A secondary layer built on top of a blockchain network that enables faster and cheaper transactions.

pow.name: Proof of Work
pow.description: A consensus mechanism that requires participants to perform a certain amount of computational work to add a new block to the blockchain.

pos.name: Proof of Stake
pos.description: A consensus mechanism that requires participants to prove ownership of a certain amount of cryptocurrency to add a new block to the blockchain.

smart_contract_platform.name: Smart Contract Platform
smart_contract_platform.description: Self-executing contracts with the terms of the agreement between buyer and seller being directly written into lines of code.
